body.name: Astercook Knife Set, Kitchen Knife Set with Built-in Sharpener Block, Dishwasher Safe, 15 Pieces German Stainless Steel Knife Block Set, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 38 mins
features: ALL IN ONE PERFECT SET - 15 PCS knife set includes: 8" Chef Knife, 8" Slicing Knife, 7" Santoku Knife, 8" Serrated Bread Knife, 5" Utility Knife, 3.5" Paring Knife, 6 * 4.5" Steak Knives, 1 Kitchen Shears, and Black Hardwood Knife Block with Built-in Sharpener.

DISHWASHER SAFE - This kitchen knife set with block is easy to maintain, has been tested many times over to stay in top condition after dishwasher cleaning, and is perfect for storage after washing and drying.

PROFESSIONAL QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL - Knives are forged from German 1.4116 stainless steel and hand polished to maintain sharp edges with a unique anti-rust, anti-stick, and anti-oxidant Teflon coating that is dent-free, keeping the blades in top condition at all times so that the knives will last a long and stable time.

EXCLUSIVE DESIGN - The handles of this kitchen knife set are designed by the most professional designers with ergonomic handles that fit perfectly in any hand size, providing you with the most comfortable grip for long time use. Equipped with a built-in sharpener, you can sharpen your knives directly yourself without the need for a sharpening stone.

LIFETIME WARRANTY - Each Astercook knife set is backed by excellent quality and undergoes a rigorous quality inspection to provide you with a lifetime warranty, perfect for professional and amateur chefs alike. Perfect gift for Mother's Day, Weddings, Birthdays, Housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I've used
reviews.reviewText: I've used a few knife sets from others' homes and they are not as good as these. These are great quality, feels nice, look nice, and they are very sharp. Cutting is so easy with these and it it washes perfect in dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good product very a very agreeable price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this kitchen knife set, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The cleanliness and quality of these knives have truly exceeded my expectations.First and foremost, the cleanliness factor is a game-changer. The blades are incredibly easy to clean, and they seem to resist staining and discoloration, which is a huge plus for someone like me who values a spotless kitchen. Even after cutting up tomatoes and other acidic ingredients, there's no sign of staining or odor retention. A quick rinse and wipe, and they're as good as new. This feature alone has made meal prep and cooking a breeze.Now, let's talk about quality. These knives are an absolute dream to work with. The precision and sharpness of the blades are remarkable. They effortlessly glide through all types of ingredients, whether it's slicing, dicing, or chopping. The ergonomic handles provide a comfortable grip and excellent control, reducing the risk of accidents in the kitchen.What I appreciate most is that this set offers a variety of knife types, perfectly suited for various culinary tasks. From the versatile chef's knife to the small utility knife, each one has its purpose and excels in its role. The high-quality materials used in these knives ensures that they will remain sharp for a long time, even tho they do feature an integrated sharpener which is a relief compared to my previous knife set that needed frequent sharpening.In terms of durability, these knives have held up exceptionally well. I've been using them daily for a couple weeks now, and they show no signs of wear and tear. They still look and perform like they did on day one.This kitchen knife set has proven to be an excellent investment. The combination of exceptional cleanliness and top-notch quality has elevated my cooking experience. If you're in the market for a knife set that's easy to maintain and delivers outstanding performance, look no further. This set has truly earned its place in my kitchen, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who values both cleanliness and quality in their culinary tools.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy knife set
reviews.reviewText: Such a beautiful knife set! They clean and cut super well. This is one of the best knife sets I have ever had. It's also nice to look at on my counter! The blades are very sharp, so be careful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sharp and nice looking knife set. High quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love them. Great price. Very sharp. Very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Handles feel like cheap plastic. All blades were sharp out of the box. The block is veneered wood. I traded out the chef knife with a Victorinox, doesn’t fit. So my farberware 8” is in there for now. Also traded out the 3.5 paring with my Mercer. The Mercer fits perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Look great on the kitchen counter. The knives are extremely sharp and of good quality. My old set had rusted blades, so I bought this set with the black blades hoping they will not rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For me…who had no good knives these are the difference between a lot of prep vs little prep. They are sharp, really sharp and did I say sharp! We have sharpened two of the knives already and it takes little effort to resharpen them. They also have an excellent balance in your hand so not as much fumbling when chopping. I think it was a good value for the money and I still remark how much of a difference they make.
